body.name: Etour Webcam Desk Mount Stand with 360° Ballhead, Heavy Base Height Adjustable Compatible with Logitech Webcam C920 C922 Brio 4K, and Other Webcam with 1/4" Thread for Live Streaming/Video Calling
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Saturday, February 17 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Friday, February 16. Order within 21 hrs 12 mins
features: 【Height Adjustable】: The height of this Etour heavy-duty Desk Webcam stand is adjustable from 9.2'' to 15.5'' inches with a reliable clutch, allowing you to place it at the optimal height for maximum comfort while using 【Webcams are not included】

【Multi-Angle For More Possibility】Try out the mind-boggling “Rotatable ball,” with 360 ° head rotation. Your webcam at any angle in the horizontal, vertical, Perfect for YouTube Videos , video calling and live selfie streaming.

【Ultimate Compatibility】: Webcam stand with 1/4 '' Screw is Compatible with logitech BRIO Ultra HD 4K Pro Webcam c920 c922 C925 C930 C615. (NOTE: If connected to BRIO, please remove the clip under your BRIO and you will find the 1/4” screw hole.)
【Inside the Box】Package includes: 1 x Heavy duty base, 1 x Telescopic rod, 1 x Rotation Ball Heads
▲▲ NOTE ▲▲ Only includes desktop stand and ball head (webcam not included)

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Easy to Install The desk mic stand is easy to install and use. Unscrew the knob to adjust the height you need. Use the included metal 1/4“ male female screw to connect your Webcam Compatible with Logitech C920 C922/BRIO Ultra HD 4K Pro Webcam, Tabletop Tripod for Live Streaming/Video Calling Height Adjustable & Portable The height of stand is adjustable from 9.2 inches to 15.5 inches. You can adjust the height you want according to your actual needs. providing great convenience for various types of activities like meetings, Distance education Live Streaming Video calling Live Makeup 360° Swivel Head With 1/4'' Standard screw Holds the phone clip/webcam well. The ball head adjusts easily from landscape to portrait, and anywhere in between

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 20, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars This will help people seeing you on Zoom feel that you are looking at them and not somewhere else.
reviews.reviewText: I participate in a fair number of Zoom meetings regularly, and always felt that the other participants would see me staring down (at my monitor) and not interacting more directly with them (through the camera mounted above my monitor). I'd looked at some of the small cameras that "center mount" on or in front of the monitor, but they all had mixed reviews about quality of the image. The Etour webcam desk mount stand let me use the camera I was already using but lets me place it in the center of my monitor screen with minimal blocking of my view. It lets me adjust the camera height quickly and easily, and has made me feel like much more of a direct participant in on-line meetings.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 25, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars I wish I got this earlier
reviews.reviewText: It's there. It just sits there. Holds the Webcam. It doesn't interfere with other things on my desk, its great for meetings. I wish I would have gotten this sooner. If you work remotely this is amazing.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 7, 2023
reviews.reviewText: If this fits your needs, you won't be disappointed. This is well built, very sturdy, and all the motion features work very well.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 27, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I just wish it was a little taller so it could come up behind my monitor.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 11, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars It's a good budget mount
reviews.reviewText: This item is very easy to simply spin in a camera and then plug in the camera and be good to go. Definitely painless and a very solid mount that doesn't shake TOO much when I erase some art.I bought this for art streams on Twitch. With an autofocus lens, and a camera pointed down, it blurred a lot because of the autofocus. But that's more of a camera mindfulness-- it takes adjusting.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 11, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Camera stand that stands up to the test!
reviews.reviewText: I didn't like my old stand, it just didn't fit the spot. This stand? Perfect! It has a nice weight to it, and my camera sits nicely between my two monitors. I would highly recommend!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 21, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Just what I needed
reviews.reviewText: The stand arrived on schedule and was easy to put together. I like the swivel head and the ability to tilt the camera. Also great being able to raise or lower it with ease. The base is solid and the locking mechanism keeps it stable at the right height.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 4, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars No thread to work with
reviews.reviewText: As others have stated, mine came with wrong threaded base. No contact info, no email, no help from Amazon Prime.
